item.title: 4 real-life examples of using reflection in C#
item.description: As C# developers, we sometimes must interact dynamically with objects, fields, properties, methods, or types. Use cases such as inter-mapping between types, traversing model properties, developing an extensible system, injecting dependencies, etc., demand runtime handling. You may wonder how to tackle such scenarios. In this post, I will show you Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/4-real-life-examples-of-using-reflection-in-c/
